name: To The Top (itch) (MalosoCreations)
description:
Introduction:
This is a simple game I put together for a first year assignment using Unity for the first time.

Game:
Attempt to reach the top of the tower by navigating the map and solving puzzles. Collect all three keys to unlock the door at the top of the tower.

Controls:
W             Move Forward
A               Strafe Left
S               Move Back
D              Strafe Right

Space      Jump

Escape    Exit Game
